name: AVEN
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
The Alexa skill is purpose to contrlo Home appliances.
The main features are the lighting control,security and windows curtain closes and opening.
the skill work with Aven Hub for the proper action to happen to home appliances.
Example: Alexa Turn On Light,Alexa Turn off light.
Users to connect Aven hub using Wi-Fi:
1. Download the Aven App. If you are using the App for the first time create your account using your Aven App.
2. Ensure that the hub is powered on Red LED is on. And then connect your Android device to the Aven Wi-Fi.
3. Open the Aven App and then wait for network dialog to display.
4. Enter your home’s Wi-Fi SSID and password as prompted, and then click submit button.
5. Yellow LED is on when Wi-Fi connected to the Hub.
6. Whenever Blue LED on Hub is ready for control home appliances.

the skill does not use make any commercial advertises for the Accounts that are linked to use this skill.
